channel.title: DB on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in DB on My New Hugo Site

item.title: 离线安装mysql
item.description: 离线安装mysql 1.查看是否安装 1 2 rpm -qa | grep mariadb rpm -qa | grep mysql 2.如果已安装则卸载rpm rpm -e –nodeps –nodeps:由于安装包的依赖问题，需要强制删除 3.下载rpm包 rpm包 mysql-community-client mysql-community-devel mysql-community-libs mysql-community-server mysql-community-libs mysql-community-common 4.将rpm包通过xftp等方式放入linux服务器 5.根据rpm安装 到rpm包目录下使用命令 1 rpm -ivh --force mysql-community-common-5.7.24-1.el7.x86_64.rpm mysql-community-libs-5.7.24-1.el7.x86_64.rpm mysql-community-client-5.7.24-1.el7.x86_64.rpm mysql-community-server-5.7.24-1.el7.x86_64.rpm mysql-community-devel-5.7.24-1.el7.x86_64.rpm mysql-community-libs-compat-5.7.24-1.el7.x86_64.rpm 6.启动mysql 1 service mysqld start 7.
